text:
Through emotional stories of children fighting #cancer, @WeedThePplFilm educates audiences about medical #cannabis as a human rights issue. Directed by @RickiLake & @AbbyEpstein, this #documentary is screening in October at select theaters. 
https://t.co/ql8Y5vyv5v #WeedThePeople https://t.co/hcLrMjsASi
